channel.title: Some questions for a blank server
channel.description:
I just download clean czar 4.7 cause I didn't much like the packaging in 5.
Anyway I would enjoy links or just an explanation yourselves of how to do these: 1. Add the ::tele command 2. Add a ::teleto and ::teletome and ::teleall 3. How to choose what rights of people have commands (like how to make it so Tele is admin+ only (so admin and owner) or mod+ (so mod, admin, and owner) 4. How to choose where you want pking to be (so like within x and y to x and y (or z whichever rs uses) 5. How to make the teleports in the magic commands (say lumby tele teles you to home) 6. How to make a ban, IPban, mute, kick, IPmute
Thanks guys, I know it's alot, and there used to be a tutorial somewhere that had all of these but now I can't find it. And PLEASE don't lead me to the page with the links to all the tutorials.

item.title: Some questions for a blank server
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

Thanks I will try that stuff later… I need a new client for Czar as there link is broken…

For 6 there is no ban command I meant I need to make one, how would I go about doing that?

Do you know where I can download a basic client with the GUI.java? Like only a client (No screenshot button or crap ontop) (and no IPchange in the login screen)

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions for a blank server
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

1. } if (command.startsWith("tele") && playerRights >= 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); toX = newPosX; toY = newPosY;

2.[code=cfm]}
if (command.startsWith(“teletome”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		if (!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()) {
                    p.toX = absX;
                    p.toY = absY;
                    p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
                    p.updateRequired = true;
                    p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been teleported to " + playerName);
		}
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }[/code]

2b.[ } if (command.startsWith("teleto") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(8); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; if(!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()){ toX = p.absX; toY = p.absY; heightLevel = p.heightLevel; updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported to "+p.playerName; sM("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName); } } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to.."); }

3.what u do is change the value of (playerRights >= 1){ , change 1 to 3 or 2. now it means that mod and all above him can use this command or teleport. Depends on where you use it. But if you want it to be used by mods only , and no one else use (playerRights != 1){

5.Teleport names = texthandler.java
Teleports = clickingMost.java
The teleports start at
case 4146:
and go down

  1. Use ::/(/)ban XXXX(mute , kick , ipban , ipmute) commands ----- XXXX is a player’s name.

Hope I helped. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions for a blank server
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

I just download clean czar 4.7 cause I didn’t much like the packaging in 5.

Anyway I would enjoy links or just an explanation yourselves of how to do these:

  1. Add the ::tele command
  2. Add a ::teleto and ::teletome and ::teleall
  3. How to choose what rights of people have commands (like how to make it so Tele is admin+ only (so admin and owner) or mod+ (so mod, admin, and owner)
  4. How to choose where you want pking to be (so like within x and y to x and y (or z whichever rs uses)
  5. How to make the teleports in the magic commands (say lumby tele teles you to home)
  6. How to make a ban, IPban, mute, kick, IPmute

Thanks guys, I know it’s alot, and there used to be a tutorial somewhere that had all of these but now I can’t find it. And PLEASE don’t lead me to the page with the links to all the tutorials.
